title: PNW Rover Hip Pack lands with quality build & comfortable fit
content:
Need more storage than the clever pocket system of the new PNW Lander jacket? Now the company is releasing another new accessory that isnâ€™t cockpit-related. Along with clothing, PNW is now offering their own hip pack, called the Rover. Every day it seems like more hip packs are launched, but PNW has gone about it
